AND ISU.USER_NAME LIKE '${employeeCode}%'
AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT USER_BO FROM M_TEAM_MEMBER EGM WHERE 1=1 AND ISU.USER_NAME=EGM.USER_BO )
SELECT USER_NAME as employeeCode,REAL_NAME as name FROM iap_sys_user_t ISU WHERE EXISTS( SELECT USER_BO FROM M_TEAM_MEMBER EGM WHERE EGM.TEAM_BO=#{teamBO} AND ISU.USER_NAME = EGM.USER_BO )
